In about a month I may buy volumes 4 and/or 5. Assuming they don't kick in my door and take me to jail, you know where you'll find them.

They won't kick in your door and take you to jail. But Mr. Ellison will hunt you down and cut off your balls.

Just sayin'.
That would be pretty frightening, if Harlan Ellison was watching TPB closely for signs of his works, just waiting to hunt you down. And somehow not surprising.
